scenario_text.value: (This isn’t good. Everyone looks on edge.)

Takuma, is it just me or do things feel tense
around here?
Yeah... I guess so.

(It feels so grim...
What can I do to make people feel better?)

(Maybe it was a bad idea to make them walk.
Should I try to lighten the atmosphere?)
(What would help people most?)
Resting a bit.
Talking about something.
Get everyone to regroup!

We’re not fully recovered yet.
How about we rest some more?

We shouldn’t do anything too rash before the
professor gets back.

What’s the point of resting more?
We’ve already recovered as much as we can.

You look a little pale though, Saki.
Maybe we should rest...

I’m fine.
Doing nothing is even more draining.

You must be in shock like the rest of us
though, Saki.
Sitting here just thinking is killing me.
And resting won’t bring back the dead.
Saki...
It’s better to be safe than sorry.

Then can we explore this area a little more
before the professor gets back?

More sitting and thinking is unhealthy at
this point. It’d be better to keep moving.

True. Seems safe enough to explore around
here, right?
Can we at least talk about something?
Like what?

Anything. Stuff that’s bothering you, what to
do next, whatever.

Judging by the way everyone’s walking, we
seem pretty well rested after all.

So maybe it’s time to put our feelings into
words and figure out what we’re gonna do.
Yeah. Everyone’s so down, I hate it.
Take it easy. You look completely exhausted.

I’m tired, but only a comfy bed would really
help at this point.

With all this exploring we might suddenly
find an enemy base. Then what?

We could really use some good news to cheer
people up.

(Miu’s right. We need something to lighten
the mood.)

We’re exhausted from all the horrible things
that’ve happened.

But now’s the time to brace ourselves.
We have to find the strength to push on.

The sooner we find the enemy base, the better
our chances of making it back.

Right...
There are still things that need doing.
Like Takuma said, we’ve gotta keep fighting.

Well put, Aoi. And I’ll be here to help when
the going gets tough.

I’ve had to rely on you for so much,
Labramon...
Why do you look so sad?
This isn’t good. Can’t we do something?

Not much any of us can say.
She has to figure it out for herself.

You’re right...
But it still annoys me.
Hmm? Takuma, look over there!
Huh? Crap! Enemies are coming!
Just look at us! What are we gonna do?!

Don’t hold back now!
Like I said, I’m on your side here!
You’re gonna fight for me, Floramon?

Of course!
Be relentless, everyone!

(Terrible timing for an attack...
But it’s better than being caught alone.)
(We’ve gotta pull through somehow!)
